snippet: Officials had reported earlier that Wade M. Page, who the police say killed six people at a Sikh temple, was fatally shot by the police.
abstract: Interviews with neighbors and colleagues of Wade M Page, who is accused of killing six people at a Sikh temple in Oak Creek, Wisconsin, depict a troubling final few weeks in his life.

byline.contributor: James Dao, Dirk Johnson and Steven Yaccino contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Officials had reported earlier that Wade M. Page, who the police say killed six people at a Sikh temple, was fatally shot by the police.

headline.seo: Clues Are Sought Into Last Weeks of Sikh Temple Gunman
headline.main: Investigators Seek Clues in Gunman’s Last Weeks Before Temple Murders
headline.print_headline: Investigators Seek Clues In Gunman’s Last Weeks Before Temple Murders
